Value.label: Paddle Control
Value.Help: Normal mode: Upper paddle turns the light on, lower paddle turns the light off. Reverse will reverse those functions.

Value.label: LED Indication Control
Value.Help: LED Indication light function. Normal has the LED Indication on when the switch is off, off when the switch is on.

Value.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer
Value.Help: Time, in seconds, for auto-off timer delay. 0 (default) disables the timer.

Value.label: On Off Status After Power Failure
Value.Help: Status after power on after power failure. OFF will always turn light off. ON will always turn light on. Restore will remember the latest state and restore that state.
